metadata.Title: CVE-2020-28025 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Exim 4 before 4.94.2 allows Out-of-bounds Read because pdkim_finish_bodyhash does not validate the relationship between sig->bodyhash.len and b->bh.len; thus, a crafted DKIM-Signature header might lead to a leak of sensitive information from process memory.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-28025` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

exim4 - 4.94-15ubuntu1.2
exim4-base - 4.94-15ubuntu1.2
exim4-config - 4.94-15ubuntu1.2
exim4-daemon-heavy - 4.94-15ubuntu1.2
exim4-daemon-light - 4.94-15ubuntu1.2
eximon4 - 4.94-15ubuntu1.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: exim4 package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.94-15ubuntu1.2').
